analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/12/0xf412af62269a0b3b10ea727df81231cdc5bb6364.sol:
	Contract dCHF has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/12/0xf412af62269a0b3b10ea727df81231cdc5bb6364.sol#333-335)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/12/0xf412af62269a0b3b10ea727df81231cdc5bb6364.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/12/0xf412af62269a0b3b10ea727df81231cdc5bb6364.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/12/0xf412af62269a0b3b10ea727df81231cdc5bb6364.sol#210) is not in mixedCase
